    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lab Rat](/Feats.aspx?ID=1303) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=234" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 23 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've spent more than your share of time in an alchemy lab. You might have been an alchemist yourself, an assistant, or perhaps even a test subject. Either way, you have been exposed to a wide variety of [alchemical poisons](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-poisons) and [elixirs](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-elixirs), leaving you with increased tolerance of their effects. You have a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against poison and harmful effects from elixirs. If you roll a success on your saving throw against an elixir or poison, you get a critical success instead.
